reviewText:
If you aspire to be 'The Man,' and are not quite sure how, this series of films will be a practical guide to talking like, acting like, and indeed becoming 'The Man.' Just take a look at the teacher in the image provided. He is most definitely 'The Man.' That little boy better watch out.

This a strange and wonderful collection of propaganda films from an age past, these movies are laughable when taken in a modern context. Inner city teachers especially will have a field day with the advice offered on maintaining a quiet classroom, or the pearls of wisdom on 'appropriate discipline.' These reminded me of the old "Reefer Madness" films from the same era. They have the same practiced tone of relentless authority and undercurrent of hysteria.
